name: Call Fey Spirit
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You call a playful fey spirit into being at target point. It emanates bright light in a 15 foot radius and dim light 15 feet farther. It can move up to 20 feet now and at the start of each of your turns. It is incorporeal and can't be affected by anything.

The number of spirits summoned increases by 1 per tier above 1. You can't cast this spell above tier 1 unless a talent allows you.
